announcement.title: Admission Forms are available. Please collect admission froms from the office as soon as possible.
announcement.description: The school has chosen the 'design thinking' approach towards management education. All our efforts and manifestations as a result stem from the integration of design thinking into management education. We dream to create an environment conducive to experiential learning.
